name: Dr. Gillian Lockitch
what_you_do: Dr. Gillian Lockitch is a retired physician who shares expertise on healthspan extension and epigenetic aging.

signature_programs: The Ageless Mind Blueprint, The Better Body Healthspan Blueprint
